articles.title: Asia Cup 2023: Yuzvendra Chahal's wife Dhanashree Verma posts cryptic messages after bowler ruled out of India - DNA India
articles.description: Asia Cup 2023: BCCI on Monday announced an 18-member Indian squad for the upcoming Asia Cup 2023.
articles.content: Asia Cup 2023: BCCI on Monday announced an 18-member Indian squad for the upcoming Asia Cup 2023.Yuzvendra Chahal’s wife Dhanashree Verma has shared cryptic posts a day after the former was ruled out… [+2056 chars]
